thread.title: BRIEF-China Zhengtong Auto Services Holdings Company & Controlling Shareholder Enter Placing Agreement

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Zhengtong Auto Services Holdings Company & Controlling Shareholder Enter Placing Agreement

organizations.name: china zhengtong auto services holdings ltd
brief-china zhengtong auto services holdings company

text:
Jan 12 (Reuters) - China Zhengtong Auto Services Holdings Ltd:
* COMPANY AND ITS CONTROLLING SHAREHOLDER, JOY CAPITAL, ENTERED INTO PLACING AGREEMENT
* INTENDS TO APPLY PROCEEDS FROM PLACING FOR DEVELOPMENT OF ITS AUTOMOBILE FINANCE BUSINESS.
* DEAL FOR PLACING PRICE OF HK$7.70 PER PLACING SHARE. * ‚ÄçNET PROCEEDS FROM PLACING WILL AMOUNT TO HK$1.73 BILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
